attributes.action: Uk to suspend mortgages all mortgages, council tax and bills to alleviate burden
attributes.additional_details:
Many, homeowners rely on their earnings to pay their bills that runs into thousands a month.
Even though some has the opportunity to work from home, because of the nature of their job, many cannot. Several people still make the effort to battle through, but the earnings are down, adding extra burden to every household. 
It’s time for the UK show that they care.
Banks, councils energy provided have made enough profit in the past to see us through this difficult times.
attributes.background:
In this difficult times people are forced to take unnecessary risks and chose between their health an the economical impact.
It is time that the government take a stand and make assurances. The £78 does not go far enough,
